---
id: tigris-delete-bucket
title: "Delete a bucket"
description:
  "Deletes the bucket and all its contents. If the bucket is not empty, it will
  not be deleted unless the `force` query parameter is set to `true`."
sidebar_label: "Delete a bucket"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "delete api-method"
info_path: partner-integrations/api/tigris-extensions-api-reference
custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete a bucket"}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/v1/providers/{provider_id}/orgs/{org_id}/buckets/{bucket_name}"}
></MethodEndpoint>

Deletes the bucket and all its contents. If the bucket is not empty, it will not
be deleted unless the `force` query parameter is set to `true`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
></Heading>

<details
  style={{ marginBottom: "1rem" }}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary style={{}}>
    <h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>
      Path Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary>
  <div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{
          name: "provider_id",
          in: "path",
          required: true,
          description: "Provider ID",
          schema: { type: "string" },
        }}
      ></ParamsItem>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{
          name: "org_id",
          in: "path",
          required: true,
          description: "Organization ID",
          schema: { type: "string" },
        }}
      ></ParamsItem>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{
          name: "bucket_name",
          in: "path",
          required: true,
          description: "Bucket name",
          schema: { type: "string" },
        }}
      ></ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>
<details
  style={{ marginBottom: "1rem" }}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary style={{}}>
    <h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>
      Query Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary>
  <div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{
          name: "force",
          in: "query",
          required: false,
          description:
            "If set to true, deletes the bucket even if it's not empty",
          schema: { type: "boolean" },
        }}
      ></ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

              <SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}>
                <TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}>

                    data-collapsed={false}
                    open={true}
                  >
                    <summary
                      style={{}}
                      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}
                    >
                      <strong>Schema</strong>
                    </summary>
                    <div
                      style={{ textAlign: "left", marginLeft: "1rem" }}
                    ></div>
                    <ul style={{ marginLeft: "1rem" }}>
                      <SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"message"}
                        required={false}
                        schemaName={"string"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{ type: "string" }}
                      ></SchemaItem>
                    </ul>
                  </details>
                </TabItem>
                <TabItem
                  label={"Example (from schema)"}
                  value={"Example (from schema)"}
